languages.text: "Это сложно описать словами, Ваша Светлость. Я никогда прежде не видела столь внушительных и ярких церемоний". {n}Голос девушки звучит пылко и вдохновенно, а глаза сияют от сдерживаемого восторга.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Это сложно описать словами, Ваша милость. Я никогда прежде не видела столь внушительных и ярких церемоний". {n}Голос девушки звучит пылко и вдохновенно, а глаза сияют от сдерживаемого восторга.{/n}

languages.text: "It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained excitement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это сложно описать словами, Ваша Светлость. Я никогда прежде не видела столь внушительных и ярких церемоний". {n}Голос девушки звучит пылко и вдохновенно, а глаза сияют от сдерживаемого восторга.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained glee.{/n}

"It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained glee.{/n}

"It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained excitement.{/n}

"It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained excitement.{/n}

"It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained excitement.{/n}

languages.text: 「言葉にはしにくいのですが、陛下。これほど壮大で胸を打たれる式典は初めてです」{n}アスタルチアの声は情熱と感動に満ちており、興奮を隠すことなく瞳を輝かせている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「言葉にはしにくいのですが、陛下。これほど壮大で胸を打たれる式典は初めてです」{n}アスタルチアの声は情熱と感動に満ちており、興奮を隠すことなく瞳を輝かせている。{/n}

languages.text: “难以言表，大人，我从未见过如此盛大、如此震撼人心的仪式。”{n}艾丝塔西娅的声音听起来非常热烈，充满激情，她的目光闪烁着难以抑制的兴奋之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “难以言表，大人，我从未见过如此盛大、如此震撼人心的仪式。”{n}艾丝塔西娅的声音听起来非常热烈，充满激情，她的目光闪烁着难以抑制的兴奋之意。{/n}

languages.text: «Es difícil expresarme con palabras, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Nunca había presenciado una ceremonia tan grandiosa e imponente». {n}La voz de Astartia está llena de pasión e inspiración, eco de la emoción que brilla en sus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es difícil expresarme con palabras, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Nunca había presenciado una ceremonia tan grandiosa e imponente». {n}La voz de Astartia está llena de pasión e inspiración, eco de la emoción que brilla en sus ojos.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est difficile à décrire, Votre Seigneurie. Jamais encore je n'avais vu de cérémonie si grandiose, » {n}déclare Astartia d'une voix pleine d'ardeur, les yeux brillants d'une excitation à peine contenue.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est difficile à décrire, Votre Seigneurie. Jamais encore je n'avais vu de cérémonie si grandiose, » {n}déclare Astartia d'une voix pleine d'ardeur, les yeux brillants d'une excitation à peine contenue.{/n}

languages.text: "Das ist schwer in Worte zu kleiden, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich habe noch nie eine so prächtige und beeindruckende Zeremonie erlebt." {n}Astartias Stimme klingt leidenschaftlich und inspiriert, und in ihren Augen leuchtet kaum verhohlene Begeisterung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das ist schwer in Worte zu kleiden, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich habe noch nie eine so prächtige und beeindruckende Zeremonie erlebt." {n}Astartias Stimme klingt leidenschaftlich und inspiriert, und in ihren Augen leuchtet kaum verhohlene Begeisterung.{/n}

languages.text: "Kelimeler kifayetsiz kalıyor {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Daha önce hiç böylesine görkemli ve göz alıcı bir tören görmemiştim." {n}Astartia'nın sesi, kulağa tutkulu ve heyecanlı geliyor; gözleri ise güç bela bastırdığı coşkuyla parlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to put into words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Never before have I seen such a grand and striking ceremony." {n}Astartia's voice sounds passionate and inspired, and her eyes shine with barely contained excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kelimeler kifayetsiz kalıyor {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Daha önce hiç böylesine görkemli ve göz alıcı bir tören görmemiştim." {n}Astartia'nın sesi kulağa tutkulu ve heyecanlı geliyor; gözleri ise güç bela bastırdığı coşkudan parlıyor.{/n}
